div.p: A summary of what the element is used for
List of elements that may be used as children of the element
List of elements that may be used as immediate parents of the element

list.label: Attribute that may be used within this element
list.item: "Optional" or "Required" (values limited to: list of valid values for this attribute)

div.p: A narrative description of the use of the element

list.item: A listing of usage of attributes with the element (optional)
A listing of other elements in the tag library that are relevant to, or similar to, the element (optional)
